practice_phrases: 这么早
So early
她这么早
She is so early
对不起这么早
I'm sorry it's so early
我这么早到
I arrive so early
她这么早开始工作
She starts working so early
我不知道这么早
I don't know it's so early
对不起我这么早来
I'm sorry I came so early
我很高兴你这么早到
I'm very happy you arrived so early
当然你可以这么早离开
Of course you can leave so early
我不知道为什么她这么早
I don't know why she's so early
这么早离开
Leave so early
她这么早离开
She leaves so early
对不起这么早离开
I'm sorry to leave so early
我这么早离开了
I left so early
她说她这么早离开
She said she leaves so early
我不这么早离开
I don't leave so early
我很高兴你这么早离开
I'm very happy you leave so early
当然你可以这么早离开
Of course you can leave so early
我不知道她这么早离开
I don't know she leaves so early
我不知道为什么她这么早离开
I don't know why she leaves so early
她需要这么早离开。
She needs to leave so early.
我不需要这么早离开。
I don't need to leave so early.
对不起我需要这么早离开。
I'm sorry I need to leave so early.
她说她需要这么早离开。
She said she needs to leave so early.
我不知道她需要这么早离开。
I don't know she needs to leave so early.
这不是问题，我需要这么早离开。
This is not a problem, I need to leave so early.
我很高兴你不需要这么早离开。
I'm very happy you don't need to leave so early.
对不起，因为我需要这么早离开，这不是问题。
I'm sorry, because I need to leave so early, this is not a problem.
当然，如果她需要这么早离开，这不是问题。
Of course, if she needs to leave so early, this is not a problem.
我不知道为什么你认为她需要这么早离开。
I don't know why you think she needs to leave so early.
